author: scohen
msg: Based on a patch submitted by Neeme Praks, allow support for a retry count on FTP transfers.  Some
servers are unreliable for unknown - this allows for a retry count to be specified to accomodate work on such

author: scohen
msg: convert serverLanguageCodeConfig attribute to use EnumeratedAttribute pattern

author: scohen
msg: Convert ftp task systemTypeKey and timestampGranularity attributes to using the EnumeratedAttribute pattern
and add some JUnit tests of the new configuration stuff.
